channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - sensitivity

item.title: Adding mcstrans to Gentoo
item.description: If you use SELinux, you might be using an MLS-enabled policy. These are policies that support sensitivity labels on resources and domains. In Gentoo, these are supported in the mcs and mls policy stores. Now sensitivity ranges are fun to work with, but the moment you have several sensitivity levels â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
